data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Santos take a 0-1 lead thanks to Felipe Jonatan.
In the minute 14, Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ceara's Leandro Carvalho misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 17, Santos have been awarded a corner by Wagner Reway.
Ceara have a goal kick.
Free kick Ceara.
In the minute 18, Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fernando Sobral (Ceara) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
In the minute 20, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Charles (Ceara) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Santos at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
In Fortaleza Ceara attack through Tiago. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 22, Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Wagner Reway signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Wagner Reway signals a throw-in for Ceara, close to Santos's area.
In the minute 23, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 26, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Santos close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Santos.
Lucas Verissimo (Santos) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 28, Wagner Reway awards Ceara a goal kick.
In Fortaleza Santos's Marinho is caught offside.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Wagner Reway.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Ceara in the half of Santos.
Santos's Marinho looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Marinho is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Wagner Reway signals a free kick to Ceara just outside Santos's area.
At Estadio Castelao, Lucas Verissimo for the away team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
In the minute 34, Ceara have been awarded a corner by Wagner Reway.
Wagner Reway signals a Santos throw-in in Ceara's half.
Wagner Reway signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 36, Wagner Reway awards the home team a throw-in.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wagner Reway signals a free kick to Santos.
In the minute 39, Marinho of Santos gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ceara have a goal kick.
Wagner Reway signals a free kick to Ceara.
In the minute 41, Free kick Ceara.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in Santos.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Felipe Jonatan (Santos) has received a first yellow card.
Ceara's Cleber Bomfim breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Santos's Diego Pituca is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 45, Ceara to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
The first-half has come to a close in Fortaleza.
Luiz Otavio is booked for the home team and will be suspended from the next match.
In the minute 45, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Diego Pituca.
Wagner Reway has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
Wagner Reway signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in Ceara.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Ceara.
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 50, Santos are caught offside.
Bruno Pacheco is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Bruno Pacheco is booked for the home team.
In the minute 51, Leandro Carvalho (Ceara) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bruno Pacheco is back on the pitch.
In the minute 53, Wagner Reway signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Santos's Arthur Gomes gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Castelao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 55, Leandro Carvalho (Ceara) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ceara are coming forward and Bruno Pacheco gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 56, Ceara make their first substitution with Manucho replacing Leandro Carvalho.
In Fortaleza Ceara drive forward through Fernando Sobral. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Santos are pushing forward but Arthur Gomes's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 57, Wagner Reway awards Ceara a goal kick.
Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Santos.
Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 58, Free kick in a good position for Santos!
Goal kick for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
In the minute 60, Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
Santos needs to be cautious. Ceara have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 62, Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wagner Reway signals a free kick to Ceara.
In the minute 62, Can Ceara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santos's half?
Kaio Jorge (Santos) gets a yellow card.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Wagner Reway.
Manucho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ceara.
In the minute 67, Ceara have been awarded a corner by Wagner Reway.
Goal kick for Santos at Estadio Castelao.
Rafael Sobis is replacing Cleber Bomfim for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 68, Lucas Braga (Santos) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The home team have replaced Fabinho with Vinicius Lima. This is the third substitution made today by Guto Ferreira.
In the minute 69, Play has been interrupted briefly in Fortaleza to check on Felipe Jonatan, who is grimacing with pain.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
In the minute 71, Wagner Reway awards the away team a throw-in.
Santos’s Felipe Jonatan is on his feet again at Estadio Castelao.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 72, Attention is being given to Santos’s Lucas Braga and play has been suspended briefly.
Lucas Braga is back on his feet again.
Vinicius Goes heads the ball against the upright! Almost a goal there for Ceara.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Vinicius Lima for Ceara is whistled offside.
Santos have a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Wagner Reway signals a Santos throw-in in Ceara's half.
Arthur Gomes for the away team is judged to be offside.
Free kick Santos.
In the minute 78, The away team replace Kaio Jorge with Carlos Sanchez.
Cuca is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Castelao with Jobson replacing Arthur Gomes.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 80, Santos's Marinho has run offside.
Fernando Sobral for Ceara drives towards goal at Estadio Castelao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Santos are down to 10 men after Luan Peres has been shown a red card.
Samuel Xavier (Ceara) has been sent off!
In the minute 86, Free kick for Santos in the half of Ceara.
Santos's Marinho gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Castelao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Wagner Reway.
In the minute 89, Wagner Reway awards Santos a goal kick.
Guto Ferreira (Ceara) is making a fourth substitution, with Bergson replacing Charles.
Alex is on a sub for Lucas Braga for Santos.
Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 7 minutes of added time.
Free kick Ceara.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Ceara.
Vinicius Goes of Ceara smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Wagner Reway signals a Ceara throw-in in Santos's half.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
At Estadio Castelao, Bruno Pacheco has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
Alison (Santos) has been shown a straight red card by referee Wagner Reway.
Cuca (Santos) is making a fourth substitution, with Madson replacing Marinho.
